person.persName: Claudius Tift (Campbell County, Kentucky, printer and soldier)

body.p: Campbell County, Kentucky, printer and soldier. New York native. Son of Reuben Tift and Betsy de Colon Tift. Married to Mary Mullen Tift on May 9, 1846. Father of Milton Tift, Mary Tift, Elizabeth Tift, Scott Tift, Kate Tift, and Anna Tift. Printer in Campbell County in 1860. First Lieutenant in Company B, 23rd Kentucky Infantry from May 1861 to November 1862. Captain in Company H, 23rd Kentucky Infantry from November 20, 1862 to October 17, 1864.
